definition[0]: arriving at or coming to a place
definition[1]: an incoming president, government etc has just been elected or chosen
definition[2]: an incoming plane, train etc is arriving at a place
example[4]: Fog is causing delays to incoming flights.
definition[3]: incoming telephone calls, enquiries etc are received by someone rather than being made by them
example[5]: automatic filing of incoming and outgoingmail
definition[4]: an incoming government, president, leader etc has just been elected or has just started a new job
example[6]: Many analysts expect the incoming chief executive to streamline the company.
